cards.title: Tiamat, The Mouth of the Inferno
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “The Mouth of the Inferno“ side up.
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Mouth of the Inferno is immune to fire damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, The Mouth of the Inferno dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} fire damage.
When {Tiamat}, Mouth of the Inferno is destroyed, flip her.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by {Tiamat}, The Mouth of the Inferno by 1.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Fire“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt by heads by 1.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Eye of the Storm
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “The Eye of the Storm“ side up.
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is immune to lightnining damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} lightning damage.
When {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is destroyed, flip her.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm by 1.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Lightning“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage taken by heads by 1.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Jaws of Winter
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “The Jaws of Winter“ side up.
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is immune to cold damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} cold damage.
When {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is destroyed, flip her.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter by 1.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Ice“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage taken by heads by 1.

cards.title: Acid Breath
body: Destroy 2 hero ongoing cards and 2 hero equipment cards.
The Head with the highest HP deals {H} toxic damage to each hero who did not destroy a card this way.

flavorQuotes.text: It cannot be. I saw the serpent{BR}buried in the sands of my time.

cards.title: Alteration
cards.body: Play the top card of the environment deck. Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Destruction and creation, the{BR}offspring of chaos.

cards.title: Ancient Ward
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to Heads by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: My misguided vision brought it{BR}back from the underworld, and it is{BR}now stronger than ever.

cards.title: Dragon's Wrath
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by Heads by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Summer and winter's{BR}war is spreading over all.

cards.flavorReference: The Lady of the Wood, Tiamat #95

cards.title: Elemental Form
cards.body: Whenever a Head takes damage, it becomes immune to damage of that type until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Elemental alignment{BR}protofunction suggests possible{BR}future upgrade paths.

cards.title: Elemental Frenzy
body: When this card enters play, shuffle all Spell cards from the villain trash and place them beneath this card face down.
At the end of the villain turn play the top card from this pile. When this pile is depleted, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Tiamat is the wrath of the ancient{BR}world, the chaos of the elements{BR}given terrible form.

cards.title: Element of Fire
body: If {Tiamat}, The Mouth of the Inferno is active, she deals each hero target 2+X fire damage, where X is the number of Element of Fire cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the most cards in play may not play cards until the start of the next villain turn.

cards.title: Element of Ice
body: If {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is active, she deals each hero target 2+X cold damage, where X is the number of Element of Ice cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the highest HP may not use powers until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Cold and death have long been{BR}bedfellows.

cards.title: Element of Lightning
body: If {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is active, she deals each hero target 2+X lightning damage, where X is the number of Element of Lightning cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the most cards in hand may not draw cards until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: This storm was bred by an{BR}evil wind, and its master has no{BR}good intentions.

cards.title: Healing Magic
body: The Head with the lowest HP regains {H} + X HP, where X is the number of Healing Magic cards in the villain trash.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Quit changin' the cards and{BR}play the hand you were dealt!

cards.title: Mana Charge
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 3 Spell cards are revealed. Discard those cards. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck.
Shuffle all copies of Elemental Frenzy from the villain trash into the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: When things start glowing nothing{BR}good ever comes of it.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Book of the Dead #835

cards.title: Reptilian Aspect
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn each Head regains {H - 2} HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I practically severed one of its{BR}heads, and it grew back together!

cards.flavorReference: Quicksilver, Song of the Forbidden One-Shot

cards.title: Sky Breaker
cards.body: The Head with the highest HP deals each hero target {H + 2} infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: This world's end brought{BR}on by pieces of another.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is immune to cold damage.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Mouth of the Inferno is immune to fire damage.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt by heads by 1.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is immune to lightnining damage.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Maw of the Earth is immune to melee damage.
Reduce damage dealt to other villain targets by 1.

openingLines.MinistryOfStrategicScienceMailchaeCharac: Ministry Of Strategic Science Mailchae placeholder

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Breath of Decay is immune to toxic damage.
Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Breath of Decay is immune to projectile damage.
At the end of the villain turn, each head regains 2 HP.

openingLines.SeasonsOfChangeLadyOfTheWoodCharacter: Lady Of The Wood: Seasons of Change placeholder
openingLines.MinistryOfStrategicSciencesLadyOfTheWood: Ministry Of Strategic Sciences: Lady Of The Wood placeholder

promoCards.title: Tiamat
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “The Eye of the Storm” side up (after putting all other villain character cards into play). Put “{Tiamat}, The Voice of the Wind”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if The Eye of the Storm is decapitated, flip this card and put {Tiamat} The Voice of the Wind into play with 15 HP.
At the start of the villain turn, flip 1 decapitated head to its active side and restore it to 2 times {H} HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm deals each hero target 1 lightning damage.
promoCards.advanced: The first time {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm deals damage each turn, increase that damage by 2.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, flip 1 decapitated head to its active side and restore it to 2 times {H} HP.

Whenever Element of Lightning enters play and {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is decapitated, if {Tiamat}, The Voice of Wind is active she deals the X hero targets with the Highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage each, where X = 1 plus the number of ongoing cards in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, The Eye of the Storm is active, she deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 lightning damage.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to 3 times {H} HP when they become active.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “Mouth of the Inferno” side up (after putting all other villain character cards into play). Put “{Tiamat}, The Breath of Decay”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: The heroes may not win the game.
At the start of the villain turn, if Mouth of the Inferno is decapitated, flip this card and put {Tiamat} The Breath of Decay into play with 15 HP.
At the start of the villain turn, flip 1 decapitated head to its active side and restore it to 2 times {H} HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Tiamat}, Mouth of the Inferno deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 fire damage.
promoCards.advanced: The first time {Tiamat}, Mouth of the Inferno deals damage each turn, increase that damage by 2.
flippedGameplay: The heroes win the game when 6 heads are decapitated.
At the start of the villain turn, flip 1 decapitated head to its active side and restore it to 2 times {H} HP.

Whenever Element of Fire enters play and {Tiamat}, Mouth of the Inferno is decapitated, if {Tiamat}, The Breath of Decay is active she deals each hero target X toxic damage, where X = 2 plus the number of Acid Breaths in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, Mouth of the Inferno is active, she deals the hero target with the second highest HP 1 fire damage.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to 3 times {H} HP when they become active.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
setup: At the start of the game, put {Tiamat}'s villain character cards into play, “Mouth of the Inferno” side up (after putting all other villain character cards into play). Put “{Tiamat}, The Maw of the Earth”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: Face down heads are indestructible and have no game text.
If a head would be destroyed, flip it instead.
At the start of the villain turn, if Jaws of Winter is decapitated, flip this card and put {Tiamat} The Maw of the Earth into play with 15 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, 1 player must discard 1 card.
promoCards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, 1 player must discard 1 card.
flippedGameplay: Face down heads are indestructible and have no game text.
If a head would be destroyed, flip it instead.

Whenever Element of Ice enters play and {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is decapitated, if {Tiamat}, The Maw of the Earth is active she deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X = {H} plus the number of Sky Breaker cards in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Tiamat}, The Jaws of Winter is active, she deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 cold damage.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to 3 times {H} HP when they become active.
